Research

The Peace Discipline approach is evidence-supported. Systematic research was conducted to find and explore the state of the science on individual non-violent discipline options.


Quail, K. R., & Ward, C. L. (2020). Nonviolent Discipline Options for Caregivers and
Teachers: A Systematic Overview of the Evidence. Trauma, Violence, & Abuse,
Copyright © 2020 sagepub.com/journals DOI: 10.1177/1524838020967340

Read this paper
